name: Cranfont
tagline: Cranfont is a web font designed to allow us to use Cranleigh Logos as icons on our websites
body: # CRANFONT Cranfont is a web font designed to allow us to use Cranleigh Logos as icons on our websites. ##Usage Download the entire repository ensuring you keep the file paths and folders the same. In your HTML include the stylesheet: ```html ``` Referenceing an icon is quite similar to how FontAwesome works. First give the element a class of ```cranfont``` followed by the name of the icon you wish it to be prefixed with ```cranfont-```, eg: ```html ``` ##Questions? If you have any questions please contact Fred, Cranleigh's Web Developer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
